General.Name: FarGlory Hotel Co Ltd
General.Description: FarGlory Hotel Co.,Ltd engages in the operation of Farglory Hotel in Hualien, Taiwan. The company offers rooms, dining, weddings and meetings, leisure center, outdoor pool, stores, spa, and other facilities. It also operates restaurants. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Hualien, Taiwan.

4.Name: Mr. Han-Lin  Li
4.Title: Mang.ial Officer of HR & Gen. Affairs Office
